name: Shadow Loops
description:
*WEB VERSION IS AVAILABLE HOWEVER DOWNLOADABLE VERSION IS MORE STABLE*

Jump and loop back to previous location to reach greater distances.

This game is a submission for Quad Jam and was made in under 4 days, so sorry for any bugs in the game. I hope you enjoy this small game.

A and D - Move

W and Space - Jump

Left Click - Interact

Right Click - Loop

If you like what you see, follow me on twitter to keep up to date!! @dreamveilstudio
